Release LTS.432.3 of October 4, 2024
New features
The
isCurrentLang
function is now available to check the current locale in the algorithm editor, it is not recommended to use the previously available getCurrentLang function when creating new algorithms.
It is now possible to move a document between folders directly from the eDoc document interface.
Changes and improvements
The ability to adjust the proportions when setting
visual for “Image” attribute
was debugged;
For an attribute displayed as a toggle or checkbox, the “Display attribute name on the left” option is no longer available.
The default value set when creating an object via a child attribute was stabilized.
Now, when editing a visual, clicking the “Open dashboard” button in the “Dashboard” widget opens an instance of the dashboard template in a new tab.
The order of execution of
onChanged event
in the frame was adjusted to match the previously accepted logic.
The ability to add multiple virtual columns in the registry was stabilized.
Locking the ability to change the value of the checkbox field in edit mode for a user with no write access permissions was stabilized.
Dashboard control panel display is now set by the user’s access permissions.
The application of display settings for the “Image” analytical panel was stabilized.
The ability to run an action from the context menu of a graph node in the “Graph” analytical panel was improved.
Working of the exportEDocToFile function for documents created by optimized templates was stabilized.
Modal windows displayed when calling from, var and getComment functions were improved.
Viewing the algorithm log is now more user-friendly.
"Logging"
system setting
was stabilized, and the "Substitution" system setting was added.
In the
update system
the object search by change date was debugged.
When working with a business process task, the information of the error output became clearer.
Sending files from the System to e-mail was stabilized.
Time of displaying the actual list of files in the registry after loading a new file into the System was optimized.
Change of interface localization when changing the language in another application tab was stabilized.
In the EDoc module for a number of settings of print form templates the default value of switches is set to false.
The names of the “User” [SYS_USER] type attributes were modified , “Data source. Object data source. Source link” [RF_DS_TYPES_LINK], “WF. Business Process” type and related objects.
